title: Classic Poly Facepak
summary: Classic Poly is a custom watch face for the Android Wear application Face.
description: Classic Poly is a custom watch face for the Android Wear application Face. This watch face includes real time smooth second hand scrolling.*YOU MUST HAVE THE APP "FACE" TO USE THIS FACE https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=boxcrab.face
descriptionHTML:
Classic Poly is a custom watch face for the Android Wear application Face. This watch face includes real time smooth second hand scrolling.

*YOU MUST HAVE THE APP "FACE" TO USE THIS FACE
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=boxcrab.face
